ENGINE-TESTER Chess Engine

ENGINE-TESTER Chess Engine

Repository: pssnyder/engine-tester

Project Statistics

  • Total Commits: 89
  • Milestone Commits: 18
  • Documentation Files: 110
  • Data Files: 132

Overview

The engine-tester chess engine represents a significant development effort in chess AI programming. This project showcases various algorithms and optimization techniques used in modern chess engines.

Key Features

  • Advanced search algorithms
  • Sophisticated position evaluation
  • Performance optimization
  • Comprehensive testing framework

Development Timeline

  • 2025-08-23 - new v7p3r v7.0 engine (5bb90adc)
  • 2025-08-23 - c0br4 hotfix v2.1 and updates to battle framework (efb5d8db)
  • 2025-08-24 - comprehensive analysis is now running …with the optimal 30-second time allocation. This will give us the detailed insights you’re looking for about V7P3R’s performance in its strength areas. (0c22aa01)
  • 2025-08-25 - v7p3r v7.2 (2af7a12c)
  • 2025-08-29 - V7P3R_v8.0.exe publishing (110e3c46)
